_header: In Patras there born he was
_description: A song of St. Nicholas — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Mak ye merie as ye may / & syng with me I you pray’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
In patras ther born he wasThe holy buschop seynt
                    nycholas…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…To heuene blysse he vs bryngThrow vertu of the
                    trinit[e]
